Text.Page:
When you were over dealing with the Gutrend escorts, did you happen to run into a guard named {@LinkCreature:206#1020#Dakona}? She's guarding the temporary outpost north of Echo Ranch. The only one there, actually.

Truth be told, I'm worried about her. It's hard to be the only guard in an area.

Could you maybe check on her?

Lethar sent you to check on me? Really? Stupid fool.

He seems to think that the way to show affection for someone is to show a total lack of faith in their abilities. Honestly.
